p.b: pen pressure control for brush masks

body.p: Controls how the pressure reading of a graphics tablet impacts newly generated brush strokes (see Drawn mask). You can control the brush width, its hardness and its opacity. Absolutecontrol means that the pressure reading directly defines the attribute with a value between 0% and 100%. Relativemeans that the pressure reading adjusts the attribute between zero and the pre-defined default value (default off).
Sets the level for smoothing of brush strokes. Stronger smoothing leads to less nodes and easier editing at the expense of lower accuracy.
Controls how individual color channels are displayed when activated in the parametric masks feature. You can choose between false colorand grey scale(default false color).

p.b: pattern for the image infos line
position of the image info line

body.p: Controls in which panel we display the image info line. You can choose between top left top right top center bottomand hidden(default bottom).
Controls how to determine which modules are shown at the same time in the right panel. You can choose between groups icons search entry both(default both). (need a restart)

p.b: expand a single darkroom module at a time

body.p: Controls how darkroom modules are expanded. If this option is enabled, expanding a module by clickingcollapses any currently expanded module. If you want to expand a module without collapsing the others you do so with Shift+click. Disabling this option reverts the meaning of clickand Shift+click(default on).

p.b: expand the module when it is activated, and collapse it when disabled

body.p: This option allows to expand or collapse automatically modules when they are enabled or disabled. (default off)

p.b: scroll to darkroom modules when expanded/collapsed

body.p: With this option enabled the darkroom side panel will scroll a module to the top when it is expanded or collapsed (default on).

p.b: border around image in darkroom mode

body.p: Process the image in darkroom mode with a small border of the given number of pixels (default 20).
